name: configarr
description: Configarr is a backup and restore configuration management tool for services like Sonarr, Radarr, and others. It helps automate config backups and restore processes across your deployment stack.
features: Automated Backups: Schedule regular configuration backups for Arr services. Never lose settings again.
Easy Restoration: Restore configurations with a single command. Disaster recovery simplified.
Multi-Service Support: Works with Sonarr, Radarr, Lidarr, and more. Unified backup solution.
Version Control: Track configuration changes over time. Roll back when needed.
Cross-Platform: Deploy on any system running your Arr stack. Flexible deployment options.
Self-Hosted: Keep sensitive configuration data under your control. Enhanced security and privacy.
